doc.title: Kallem mama
doc.plot: A mother works hard to raise her only daughter Muna after her husband died, and she supports her until she reaches the university level in her education, but one day the mother did not approve of the relationship between her daughter and young man who lives in the same neighborhood because he didn't finish his university education, so the mother told the daughter that the only way for this man to marry her is after he finishes the university studies.
